import react from "react"; import "./MainPage.css"; import profilePicture from "../images/SD.jpg"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; function MainPage() { let [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); let [hungarian, setHungarian] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // addScroll(); }, []); function changeMode() { setDarkMode(!darkMode); console.log(darkMode); } function changeLanguage() { setHungarian(!hungarian); console.log(hungarian); } // function scroll() { // const element = event.target.id; // console.log(element); // document // .getElementById("skills") // .scrollIntoView(true, { block: "start", inline: "nearest" }); // } // button scrolling effects-------------------------------------------------------------- // a projekt v√©g√©n foglalkozni vele. // function addScroll() { // const navButtons = document.querySelectorAll(".navButton"); // console.log(navButtons); // for (let i = 0; i < navButtons.length; i++) { // navButtons[i].addEventListener("click", function () { // document // .getElementById(`${navButtons[i].innerHTML}`) // .scrollIntoView(true, { block: "start", inline: "nearest" }); // }); // } // } return ( <>
